entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
